column3: This probably could use a rebase as cdb6960 and b4feb33 have been merged.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/9e7776bf1f1aebbd6e1ef21a4144ba72a54985de for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
As the setgenerate command was set to no longer require a wallet, shouldn't a check for pWalletMain be added here? (or can the mining thread run without wallet as well, I wouldn't know for sure)\n
Good catch, I believe it should check for a non-null wallet.\n

But if you put a check here, the regtest specific `setgenerate` will also no longer work without wallet, which was the point of changing fReqWallet in the big table, I suppose, or am I missing something?\n
I needed to set fReqWallet to false so the wallet mutex is not acquired, avoiding deadlock with the mining thread.\n
